name: Multi-Verse Rap Battle
description:
Multi-Verse Rap Battle was created as part of the Untitled Game Jam #62. The theme was multiverse.

Our team decided to take a different twist on the word multiverse, and create a game where the player shoots out word projectiles of words to a verse of a song they created. The verses start out very lame, as most rappers need to practice and get better with their rhymes. We added another multiverse feature, where the main boss is you from another universe.

Our team consisted of:

Project Lead - Mathew Nold

Lead Designer - Chance Cornell

Lead Programmer - Mathew Nold

Lead Artist - Ezekial Hicks

Lead Audio Engineer - Kefa Crow
